009package Ch10_FittingLines;
010
011import java.awt.Color;
012
013import ij.ImagePlus;
014import ij.gui.Overlay;
015import ij.io.LogStream;
016import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
017import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
018import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
019import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.PntUtils;
020import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.line.LineFit;
021import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.line.LineSampler;
022import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.line.LinearRegressionFit;
023import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.line.OrthogonalLineFitEigen;
024import imagingbook.common.geometry.line.AlgebraicLine;
025import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear.AffineMapping2D;
026import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear.Rotation2D;
027import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear.Translation2D;
028import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
029import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
030import imagingbook.common.math.PrintPrecision;
031
032public class Example_Fit_Rotated_Points implements PlugIn {
033
034        private static int W = 400;
035        private static int H = 400;
036        
037        private static final double StrokeWidth = 1.0;
038        private static double DashLength = 10;
039        
040        private static final Color CentroidColor =              new Color(0,176,80);
041        private static final Color RegressionFitColor =         new Color(255,0,0);
042        private static final Color OrthogonalFitColor =         new Color(0,112,192);
043        private static final Color PointColor = Color.blue;
044        private static double PointRadius = 2;
045
046        private static Pnt2d p1 = Pnt2d.from(50, 0.5*H);
047        private static Pnt2d p2 = Pnt2d.from(W-50, 0.5*H);
048        private static int n = 100;
049        private static double sigma = 15.0;
050
051        private static boolean DrawSamplePoints = true;
052        private static boolean DrawOrthogalFit = true;
053        private static boolean DrawRegressionFit = true;
054        private static boolean DrawCentroid = true;
055
056        static {
057                LogStream.redirectSystem();
058                PrintPrecision.set(6);
059        }
060
061        @Override
062        public void run(String arg) {
063                LineSampler sampler = new LineSampler(p1, p2);
064                Pnt2d[] pts0 = sampler.getPoints(n, sigma);
065                
066                Translation2D t1 = new Translation2D(-0.5*W, -0.5*H);
067                Translation2D t2 = t1.getInverse();
068
069                for (int theta = 0; theta < 120; theta += 20) {         // step-wise rotation (in degrees)
070                        Rotation2D rot = new Rotation2D(Math.toRadians(theta));
071                        AffineMapping2D map = t1.concat(rot).concat(t2);
072                        Pnt2d[] pts = map.applyTo(pts0);
073
074                        LineFit fitO = new OrthogonalLineFitEigen(pts);
075                        AlgebraicLine lineO = fitO.getLine();
076
077                        LineFit fitR = new LinearRegressionFit(pts);
078                        AlgebraicLine lineR = fitR.getLine();
079
080                        ByteProcessor ip = new ByteProcessor(W, H);
081                        ip.setColor(255);
082                        ip.fill();
083
084                        Overlay oly = new Overlay();
085                        ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter(oly);
086
087                        // ----- draw sample points ----------------------------------
088                        if (DrawSamplePoints) {
089                                ColoredStroke pointStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, PointColor, 0);
090                                pointStroke.setFillColor(PointColor);
091                                for (Pnt2d p : pts) {
092                                        ola.addShape(p.getShape(PointRadius), pointStroke);
093                                }
094                        }
095
096                        if (DrawOrthogalFit) {
097                                ColoredStroke stroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, OrthogonalFitColor, 0);
098                                ola.addShape(lineO.getShape(W, H), stroke);
099                        }
100
101                        if (DrawRegressionFit) {
102                                ColoredStroke stroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, RegressionFitColor, DashLength);
103                                ola.addShape(lineR.getShape(W, H), stroke);
104                        }
105                        
106                        if (DrawCentroid) {
107                                Pnt2d ctr = PntUtils.centroid(pts);
108                                ColoredStroke pointStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, CentroidColor, 0);
109                                pointStroke.setFillColor(null);
110                                ola.addShape(ctr.getShape(PointRadius*2), pointStroke);
111                        }
112
113                        String title = String.format("line-%03d", theta);
114                        ImagePlus im = new ImagePlus(title, ip);
115                        im.setOverlay(oly);
116                        im.show();
117                }
118        }
119
120
121}
